trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for WebPartZoneBaseDesigner controls.
trans-unit.target: Tervezési idejű támogatja a WebPartZoneBaseDesigner szabályozza.

trans-unit.source: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner is the base class for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner> and can be inherited to support custom implementations of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner alaposztálya <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner>és egyéni implementációja támogatásához öröklődjenek <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>vezérlők.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner>

trans-unit.source: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner extends its own base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>, by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner terjeszti ki a saját alaposztály <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>, felülbírálásával a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>metódus elrejtheti a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the main purpose of this class for a control developer is that, unlike its parent, WebPartZoneBaseDesigner has a public constructor so it can be inherited directly and used as a public implementation of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben a fő Ez az osztály a vezérlő fejlesztő célja, hogy, ellentétben a szülő WebPartZoneBaseDesigner rendelkezik nyilvános konstruktorral, hogy azok örökölt közvetlenül, és az alaposztály nyilvános végrehajtásának használja.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A társított kötve a szerző példányt inicializál <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control associated with this designer.
Hides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle*> property at design time.

The PreFilterProperties method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property in the designer after calling the parent method.
trans-unit.target: Felülbírálja a PreFilterProperties metódus <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>elrejtheti a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>tulajdonság a szülő metódus hívása után a tervezőben.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is because the default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control does not render any zone-level verbs.
trans-unit.target: Ennek az az oka az alapértelmezett <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>vezérlő nem jeleníti meg minden zóna szintű műveletekre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to render zone-level verbs in a derived class, you must override this method to not hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy származtatott osztályban zónaszintű műveletek megjelenítéséhez, felül kell bírálnia ezt a metódust nem elrejtése a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the set of properties associated with the control.
